content:
Sure, here's a table format to help identify SILO topics that can be support pages on a main repudiating a building contract page:

| SILO Topic | Target Search Phrase |
| --- | --- |
| Understanding Breach of Contract | What is breach of contract? |
| Homeowner's Rights to Terminate | Can homeowners terminate a building contract? |
| Builder's Rights to Terminate | Can builders terminate a building contract? |
| Wrongful Termination | What is wrongful termination of a building contract? |
| Contract Termination Process | How to terminate a building contract? |
| Contract Specialist Services | When to hire a construction lawyer? |
| Damages for Repudiation | What damages can be claimed for repudiation? |

Note: The target search phrases provided are just examples and can be further optimized based on keyword research and SEO best practices.
